sentences.sContent: There is a capacitor in there.
sentences.sCn: 因为里面有一个电容器。

sentences.sContent: Part of this process involves applying an electric field to a dielectric material within the capacitor.
sentences.sContent_eng: Part of this process involves applying an electric field to a dielectric material within the capacitor.
sentences.sCn: 这个过程中需要在电容器内的绝缘材料上施加一个电场。

sentences.sContent: However, in contrast to batteries, a capacitor cannot store enough energy to power anything that lasts longer than a flash -- some fraction of a second.
sentences.sContent_eng: However, in contrast to batteries, a capacitor cannot store enough energy to power anything that lasts longer than a flash -- some fraction of a second.
sentences.sCn: 但是，相比电池，电容器储存的能量不足以维持任何比闪光时间长的时间，而闪光时间还不足一秒。

phrases.pCn: 并联电容器；分路电容器；旁路电容器
并联电容器；平行电容器
储存电容；储能电容器；存储电容器

trans.tranOther: a piece of equipment that collects and stores electricity
